metadata.Title: CVE-2014-5444 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Geary before 0.6.3 does not present the user with a warning when a TLS certificate error is detected, which makes it easier for remote attackers to conduct man-in-the-middle attacks via a crafted certificate.

criterions.comment: geary: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
